Training Session Update - October Schedule

SM
Sarah Mitchell
Training Coordinator

Dear Marcus,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm writing to provide you with the updated training schedule for October and to confirm your participation in the upcoming mandatory sessions.

October Training Schedule

We've made some adjustments to our October training calendar based on partner feedback and operational requirements:

Mandatory Sessions:

  • Safeguarding Refresher Training - October 12th, 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM (Online)
  • New Assessment Protocols - October 19th, 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM (In-person/Online hybrid)
  • Emergency Response Procedures - October 26th, 1:00 PM - 3:00 PM (Online)

Optional Professional Development:

  • Autism and Sensory Processing - October 15th, 6:00 PM - 7:30 PM
  • Effective Communication Strategies - October 22nd, 6:00 PM - 7:30 PM

Action Required

Please confirm your availability for the mandatory training sessions by October 8th. If you have any scheduling conflicts, please contact me immediately so we can arrange alternative options.

All training materials will be made available through your dashboard 48 hours before each session. Please ensure you have tested your technology setup if attending online sessions.

Training Credits

Completion of these training modules will contribute to your annual professional development requirements. Certificates will be issued upon successful completion of each session.

If you have any questions or concerns about the training schedule, please don't hesitate to reach out to me directly.

Best regards,
Sarah Mitchell
Training Coordinator
